Text.Value: This is reckless. Stop before you burn us all up.
Then let's go find one, soldier. This fire is ready to burn something wicked.
Karlach, this looks dangerous.
Oh yeah. That last soul coin was just what I needed. I feel... I feel incredible!
No, you are. Believe me, you don't want to make an enemy of me. Got it?
You're right - I overreacted. I was scared it was too much for you.

EditorData.stateContext: Karlach standing up, low level flaming

Text.Value: Don't be frightened. I'm in perfect... gods, it's so hot!

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: On 'gods,' the fire blazes hotter again. She slowly falls to 1 knee, the fire threatening to consume her.

Text.Value: Absolutely - can't wait to see you in battle.
Glad you ask. I think if I focus I can - ngh, it's so hot!

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: On 'ngh' the fire blazes hotter again. She slowly falls to 1 knee, the fire threatening to consume her.
EditorData.VFXTags: [EG] Karlach flames intensify severely, maxed out (lead in)), flames bursting unsteadily with her movements, sparks flying

Text.Value: Burn, baby, burn!
Can't hide it - I'm certifiably wonderful.

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Her inferno starts to blaze worryingly, but she shakes out her body and seems to calm it again. Nevertheless, she is strained and grimacing, the fire is having a negative effect on her.
EditorData.VFXTags: [EG] Karlach flames are extra fiery IN

Text.Value: But it didn't. That's the key here. And now I can use that power to our advantage.
Watch as she tries to gain control of the inferno.
Listen to me: take a deep breath. You can control this.

EditorData.stateContext: Karlach standing up, low level flaming

Text.Value: If I decide to burn you, you'll burn. Trust that I don't, and won't.

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: On the ground she is struggling - 'If I decide to burn.... you'll burn.' Then she starts to regain control of herself, and the flames die down. 'Trust that I don't.' She stands up, in full control, 'And won't.
EditorData.VFXTags: [EG] Karlach flames begin to weaken, less sizzling/sparks

EditorData.stateContext: On fire (max level) and on 1 knee

Text.Value: Watch this. Wait. Maybe not.

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Her inferno starts to blaze worryingly, but she shakes out her body and seems to calm it again. Nevertheless, she is strained and grimacing, the fire is having a negative effect on her.
EditorData.VFXTags: [EG] Karlach flames are extra fiery IN

Text.Value: Far from it - I thought that inferno was going to consume you.
Please. I'm in control, I - I - ngh! See?

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Her inferno starts to blaze worryingly, but she shakes out her body and seems to regain composure again. Nevertheless, she is strained and grimacing, the fire is having a negative effect on her.
EditorData.VFXTags: [EG] Karlach flames are extra fiery IN, flames bursting unsteadily with her movements

Text.Value: Perfect control. Pretty amazing, right?
That inferno was ready to consume you, whether you'll admit it or not.
Of course I can. Of course... I... can...

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: She regains composure and rises to her feet.
EditorData.VFXTags: [EG] Karlach flames begin to weaken, less sizzling/sparks

Text.Value: You're going to burn yourself up.
Don't hold me back, and I'll be your biggest ally. You'll see.
Leave her to her inferno.

EditorData.VFXTags: [EG] Karlach flames intensify severely, maxed out (lead in)), flames bursting unsteadily with her movements, sparks flying

Text.Value: You put us all at risk with that display. You're on thin ice.
Woo!

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: She struggles on the ground panting, but slowly the flames die down as she controls them. She stands up in full control and shouts 'woo!'
EditorData.VFXTags: [EG] Karlach flames begin to weaken, less sizzling/sparks

Text.Value: Showing off, I see?
There. See? Perfectly in hand. I don't know what you were so tweaked about.

EditorData.stateContext: Karlach standing up, low level flaming

Text.Value: Stop it, Karlach - I don't like this.
Check this out!

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Animation: The idea here is that she's showing off with fire: wants to impress the player with her prowess, but it's going to quickly get out of hand. A bit like the scene from 'Avatar: The Last Airbender' where Aang is showing off firebending and burns Katana.
EditorData.NodeContext: She cast fireball on her hands while saying line, she playing around with the fireball by throwing them from one hand to another, trying to impress the player but kinda get out of hand eventually. [Choices]
EditorData.SFXTags: [MATV] [SPELLS] sound of ball of fire being tossed around, appearing and disappearing, [HUS][GUS-286937]Karlach on fire loop (low level)
EditorData.VFXTags: [MATV] ball of fire appearing in her hand, she juggles with it and then makes it disappear., [HUS][GUS-286937]Karlach on fire loop (low level)

Text.Value: Nothing's too much for me - you can quote me on that. Now let me put my money where my mouth is - point me at the nearest devil, and I'll burn him clean.
Phew. Looks like I've got a few kinks to work out with that one. Pretty amazing though, right? Who knows what I could do after a few more soul coins.
What else can you do?

Synopsis: Overdrive moment after consuming 10 soul coins
